Hi Rainsberge,

Thanks a lot for your information.

Sumesh


"J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains762@...> wrote:                                  sumesh_ps2002 wrote:
 
 > I have few test cases , i am running test cases from maven.
 > I want two test to be run at beginning or at the end because it is
 > doing some clean of data.
 > How do i achieve this using maven?
 
 I don't know about doing this with Maven, but if you're using JUnit 3, 
 you can use GSBase's OrderedTestSuite to control the order of some tests 
 and let the others execute in the default order.
 
 gsbase.sourceforge.net
 
 I guess you would just run the OrderedTestSuite with Maven.
 --
